medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening right lower quadrant (RLQ) abdominal pain with subjective fevers and chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began last evening with worsening abdominal pain. The patient has had subjective fevers and chills over the past few days. The pain has been worsening since onset and is exacerbated by movement. The patient denies nausea and vomiting and has had no appetite since symptoms began. She has never had a similar episode of pain in the past.
